forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Thunder possible. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Thunder possible. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
